fn.p: The following information was supplied relating to field study approvals (i.e., approving body and any reference numbers):

An authorization for scientific activities in the Catimbau National Park area (PARNA Catimbau) was given by Instituto Chico Mendes de Conservação da Biodiversidade (ICMBio/SISBIO), an agency linked to the Brazilian Ministry of the Environment (MMA), for the collection of botanical material (authorization number 67801-1).
